question: The dominant mode of a waveguide depends on:

answers.b: the power level of the signal

question: A TEE connector used with waveguides is:
What type of waveguide is widely used?
In a series-tee, the axis of the side-arm

answers.a: is parallel to the H-field planes of the main waveguide
answers.b: is parallel to the E-field planes of the main waveguide
answers.c: is normal to the E-field of the main waveguide
